text:
="preserve">Sasi Shanker (1957 – 10 August 2016) was an Indian movie director. He directed one Tamil movie and ten Malayalam movies. He won the National Film Award for Best Film on Other Social Issues in 1993 for his movie "Narayam".
Shanker died on 10 August 2016 at the age of 57.

annotations.surface_form: National Film Award for Best Film on Other Social Issues
